name: The Butter Chicken Chef
description:
Work quickly to collect all the ingredients to create a brilliant Butter Chicken before the timer expires. But watch out, each time you successfully collect and prepare another ingredient something unexpected will change.

Controls while collecting:
- A or Left Arrow to rotate counter clockwise

- D or Right Arrow to rotate clockwise

- Space to shoot your pan

Controls while preparing:

- Arrow keys or WASD to match direction of shown input

Created between Feb. 19, 2023 and Feb. 23, 2023 for the Jame Gam 25.
Theme: Unintentional Side-effects
        - Each time you collect an ingredient a random effect occurs such as: your pan getting smaller or the ingredients spinning faster
Special Object: Butter Chicken
        - The game revolves around preparing a dish of butter chicken.

Code for this project can be found here: https://github.com/billbobphil/jame-gam-25
